amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to direct the Director of National Intelligence to make assessments regarding drug trafficking, human trafficking, and human smuggling in the Northern Triangle and Mexico and review U.S. intelligence activities in the region.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hurd (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Hurd (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hurd (TX) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
